title: Bosch 8 Kg Front Load Washing Machine WAJ2846WIN
Description: Anti Tangle function prevents clothes from tangling. Anti-Vibration Side Panels reduce vibration and noise. SpeedPerfect reduces wash cycle time up to 65%. Reload function lets you add items after cycle starts. 15 wash programs including Quick Wash and Delicates.
Warranty: 2 years comprehensive warranty, 12 years on motor

title: LG 7 Kg AI Direct Drive Front Load Washing Machine FHM1207SDM
Description: 6 Motion Direct Drive Technology for better wash quality. Smart Diagnosis for easy troubleshooting. TurboDrum for powerful wash action. Baby Care and Allergy Care programs. Energy efficient with 5 Star Rating.
Warranty: 2 years comprehensive warranty, 10 years on motor

title: Samsung 6.5 Kg Fully Automatic Top Load Washing Machine WA65A4002VS
Description: Diamond Drum for gentle fabric care. Quick Wash for small loads. Magic Filter captures lint and debris. Center Jet Pulsator for thorough cleaning. 9 wash programs including Delicates and Bedding.
Warranty: 2 years comprehensive warranty, 5 years on motor
